      • SmsMmsMessage

        public SmsMmsMessage(Context _context,
             java.lang.String _fromAddress,
             java.lang.String _messageBody,
             long _timestamp,
             int _messageType)
        Construct SmsMmsMessage with minimal information - this is useful for when a raw SMS comes in which just contains address, body and timestamp. We must then look in the database for the rest of the information
